Class Entity

java.lang.Object
io.mygame.entities.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
NPC, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object
Abstract class representing an in-game entity with a texture, position, and collision box. Provides functionality for rendering, collision detection, and position updates. This class defines core properties like texture, size, position, and a collision box, with support for complex collision detection via a polygon. Derived classes can extend it to implement specific behavior and rendering.

      public void setX(float newX)

    • setY

      Parameters:
      newY - The new y-coordinate to set.

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(float newX, float newY)
      Sets the position of the entity. Updates both the x and y coordinates and the collision box position.
      Parameters:
      newX - The new x-coordinate to set.
      newY - The new y-coordinate to set.
